TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AssociationAttribute extends System.Data.Linq.Mapping.DataAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class AssociationAttribute Inherits DataAttribute

summary.span: Designates a property to represent a database association, such as a foreign key relationship.

span.span: Designates a property to represent a database association, such as a foreign key relationship.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Utilisez cet attribut pour représenter une association dans une base de données, tels que la relation entre une clé étrangère et une clé primaire.Use this attribute to represent an association in a database, such as the relationship between a foreign key and a primary key. Dans l’exemple suivant, la `Order` classe inclut une attribut pour associer des commandes avec les clients.In the following example, the `Order` class includes an attribute to associate Orders with Customers. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.AssociationAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.AssociationAttribute/cs/northwind.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.AssociationAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.AssociationAttribute/vb/northwind.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DeleteOnNull { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: When placed on a 1:1 association whose foreign key members are all non-nullable, deletes the object when the association is set to null.

span.span: When placed on a 1:1 association whose foreign key members are all non-nullable, deletes the object when the association is set to null.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DeleteRule { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets delete behavior for an association.

span.span: Gets or sets delete behavior for an association.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Si la valeur null, aucun comportement de suppression n’est ajouté.If set to null, no delete behavior is added. Par exemple, « CASCADE » ajoutez « ON DELETE CASCADE » à la relation de clé étrangère.For example, "CASCADE" would add "ON DELETE CASCADE" to the foreign-key relationship. Dans l’exemple suivant, la règle doit effectuer aucune action.In the following example, the rule is to take no action. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.AssociationAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.AssociationAttribute/cs/northwind.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.AssociationAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.AssociationAttribute/vb/northwind.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsForeignKey { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets the member as the foreign key in an association representing a database relationship.

span.span: Gets or sets the member as the foreign key in an association representing a database relationship.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsUnique { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets the indication of a uniqueness constraint on the foreign key.

span.span: Gets or sets the indication of a uniqueness constraint on the foreign key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Lorsque la valeur est true, cette propriété indique une relation 1:1 true.When true, this property indicates a true 1:1 relationship.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ OtherKey { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets one or more members of the target entity class as key values on the other side of the association.

span.span: Gets or sets one or more members of the target entity class as key values on the other side of the association.

value.span: Par défaut = Id de la classe connexe.

span.span: Default = Id of the related class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Pour plusieurs membres, utilisez une liste séparée par des virgules.For multiple members, use a comma-separated list. La clé n’est pas nécessaire pour correspondre à la clé primaire ou clé étrangère, mais la cardinalité de l’utilisateur a déclaré (0-1 pour ou 0-n pour ) est supposé pour être true.The key is not required to match the primary key or foreign key, but the user-stated cardinality (0-1 for or 0-n for ) is assumed to be true. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.AssociationAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.AssociationAttribute/cs/northwind.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.AssociationAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.AssociationAttribute/vb/northwind.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ThisKey { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets members of this entity class to represent the key values on this side of the association.

span.span: Gets or sets members of this entity class to represent the key values on this side of the association.

value.span: Par défaut = Id de la classe conteneur.

span.span: Default = Id of the containing class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Pour plusieurs membres, utilisez une liste séparée par des virgules.For multiple members, use a comma-separated list. La clé n’est pas nécessaire pour correspondre à la clé primaire ou clé étrangère, mais la cardinalité de l’utilisateur a déclaré (0-1 pour ou 0-n pour ) est supposé pour être true.The key is not required to match the primary key or foreign key, but the user-stated cardinality (0-1 for or 0-n for ) is assumed to be true. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.AssociationAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.AssociationAttribute/cs/northwind.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.Mapping.AssociationAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.Mapping.AssociationAttribute/vb/northwind.vb#3)]
